actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a charitable contribution deduction for certain expenses incurred by whaling captains in support of Native Alaskan subsistence whaling.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a charitable deduction for expenses of a whaling captain (recognized by the Alaska Eskimo Whaling Commission) in carrying out subsistence bowhead whale hunting activities.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a charitable contribution deduction for certain expenses incurred by whaling captains in support of Native Alaskan subsistence whaling.
